1.title: The Adventures Continue!

episode of.title: Spider-Man: The Cheesy Stop-Motion Adventures (TV Series 2012– )

1.plot: The Green Goblin may be defeated, but crime is still present in New York City. This is a job for the amazing Spider-Man.

2.title: I Am the Rhino... Don't Mess with Me!

episode of.title: Spider-Man: The Cheesy Stop-Motion Adventures (TV Series 2012– )

2.plot: The Rhino makes an epic return and goes on a rampage, destroying everything in his path. Can Spider-Man stop him?

3.title: What Attacks the Lizard? Part One

episode of.title: Spider-Man: The Cheesy Stop-Motion Adventures (TV Series 2012– )

3.plot: The Lizard is back and crazier then ever! What does the lizard want and will do anything to get? Spider-Man's dead body! Will Spidey survive yet another Lizard attack?

4.title: What Attacks the Lizard? Part Two

episode of.title: Spider-Man: The Cheesy Stop-Motion Adventures (TV Series 2012– )

4.plot: Spider-Man continues to fight the Lizard with one goal in mind: survival! But will the wall-crawler survive?

5.title: Shocking!

episode of.title: Spider-Man: The Cheesy Stop-Motion Adventures (TV Series 2012– )

5.plot: Spidey meets a new foe and his most shocking yet. Spider-Man must stop the villain before he destroys New York with his shocking shock-powers.

6.title: Hunt for the Spider! Part One

episode of.title: Spider-Man: The Cheesy Stop-Motion Adventures (TV Series 2012– )

6.plot: Kraven the Hunter returns once again and this time, with a new and dangerous pet! Can the wall-crawler stop the hunter or is he finally going to be hunted?

7.title: Hunt for the Spider! Part Two

episode of.title: Spider-Man: The Cheesy Stop-Motion Adventures (TV Series 2012– )

7.plot: The hunt continues as Spidey must finish his fight with Kraven and with a new villain randomly appearing...

8.title: Hunt for the Spider! Part Three

episode of.title: Spider-Man: The Cheesy Stop-Motion Adventures (TV Series 2012– )

8.plot:

9.title: Doc Ock Wins! Part One

episode of.title: Spider-Man: The Cheesy Stop-Motion Adventures (TV Series 2012– )

9.plot: Doc Ock tries to rob a bank and Spider-Man, once again, has to stop him. Only today isn't as lucky as the days before.

10.title: Doc Ock Wins! Part Two

episode of.title: Spider-Man: The Cheesy Stop-Motion Adventures (TV Series 2012– )

10.plot: Spider-Man, for the first time in his life, fails to save the day. He is hopeless, until he gets a visit from a fellow super-hero.

11.title: Doc Ock Wins! Part Three

episode of.title: Spider-Man: The Cheesy Stop-Motion Adventures (TV Series 2012– )

11.plot: Doc Ock gets a package in the mail, while Spider-Man And Iron-Man plan how they're going to defeat the villain.

12.title: Doc Ock Wins! Part Four

episode of.title: Spider-Man: The Cheesy Stop-Motion Adventures (TV Series 2012– )

12.plot: Spider-Man and Iron-Man team-up and take on Doc Ock. Will they be able to shut down his Evil Death Machine?

13.title: Quite Shocking!

episode of.title: Spider-Man: The Cheesy Stop-Motion Adventures (TV Series 2012– )

13.plot: The Shocker returns, with new enhancements to his shocking shock weapons. Spider-Man has to save New York and put an end to the Shocker's rampage.

14.title: Who Is the Lizard? Part One

episode of.title: Spider-Man: The Cheesy Stop-Motion Adventures (TV Series 2012– )

14.plot: Through New York's newspaper, "The Daily Bugle", Spider-Man discovers the history of how the Lizard came to be.

15.title: Who Is the Lizard? Part Two

episode of.title: Spider-Man: The Cheesy Stop-Motion Adventures (TV Series 2012– )

15.plot: Out of nowhere, the Lizard returns and wants revenge to Spider-Man. Can The wall-crawler save himself?

16.title: Doc Ock Fights! Part One

episode of.title: Spider-Man: The Cheesy Stop-Motion Adventures (TV Series 2012– )

16.plot: Doc Ock may have failed to defeat Spider-Man with the Evil Death Machine, but now he's going to get the Evil Death Machine 2.0; an upgrade could finish the spider once and for all.

17.title: Doc Ock Fights! Part Two

episode of.title: Spider-Man: The Cheesy Stop-Motion Adventures (TV Series 2012– )

17.plot: Spider-Man gets blasted with the Evil Death Machine 2.0 and suddenly, his worst nightmare has come to life. All his enemies have teamed up against him.

18.title: Doc Ock Fights! Part Three

episode of.title: Spider-Man: The Cheesy Stop-Motion Adventures (TV Series 2012– )

18.plot: The showdown between Spidey and Doc Ock begins. Who will win? And what techniques will the winner use?

19.title: The Surprising Twisits of the Green Goblin! Part One

episode of.title: Spider-Man: The Cheesy Stop-Motion Adventures (TV Series 2012– )

19.plot: Norman Osborn lives and he has some surprises for his arch enemy; Spider-Man.

20.title: The Surprising Twists of the Green Goblin! Part Two

episode of.title: Spider-Man: The Cheesy Stop-Motion Adventures (TV Series 2012– )

20.plot: Spider-Man isn't too happy to see that his most deadly foe, the Green Goblin, is alive and more powerful then ever. All hell breaks lose very quickly.

21.title: The Surprising Twists of the Green Goblin! Part Three

episode of.title: Spider-Man: The Cheesy Stop-Motion Adventures (TV Series 2012– )

21.plot: The Green Goblin is determined now more then ever to destroy Spider-Man. Can the web-head save himself?

22.title: Spider-Man: No More!

episode of.title: Spider-Man: The Cheesy Stop-Motion Adventures (TV Series 2012– )

22.plot:

1.title: The Origin of Spider-Man!

episode of.title: Spider-Man: The Cheesy Stop-Motion Adventures (TV Series 2012– )

1.plot: Peter Parker is bitten by a radioactive spider and transformed into the amazing Spider-Man, complete with all the web-swinging, wall-crawling abilities of a spider. Meanwhile, Norman Osborn transforms himself into the Green Goblin.

2.title: Doc Ock Attack!

episode of.title: Spider-Man: The Cheesy Stop-Motion Adventures (TV Series 2012– )

2.plot: When the evil Dr. Octopus tries to rob a bank, the amazing Spider-Man must stop him and bring Doc Ock to justice!

3.title: Sands of Crime!

episode of.title: Spider-Man: The Cheesy Stop-Motion Adventures (TV Series 2012– )

3.plot: After Spider-Man captures a pair of robbers, Sandman sets them free! Can Spidey capture all three bad guys when one of them is nearly unstoppable?

4.title: Where Crawls the Lizard?

episode of.title: Spider-Man: The Cheesy Stop-Motion Adventures (TV Series 2012– )

4.plot: There's a new villain in town... only this is not like any one that has come before it. TThis is a monster! The amazing Spider-Man must stop the Lizard before it tears the entire city apart!

5.title: Doc Ock Strikes Back! Part One

episode of.title: Spider-Man: The Cheesy Stop-Motion Adventures (TV Series 2012– )

5.plot: Doc Ock managed to escape to police and is now at large! Spider-Man must stop the criminal and protect his true identity in this two-part spectacular.

6.title: Doc Ock Strikes Back! Part Two

episode of.title: Spider-Man: The Cheesy Stop-Motion Adventures (TV Series 2012– )

6.plot: Doc Ock managed to escape the police and is now at large! Spider-Man must stop the criminal and protect his true identity in this two-part spectacular.

7.title: The Grotesque Adventure of the Green Goblin

episode of.title: Spider-Man: The Cheesy Stop-Motion Adventures (TV Series 2012– )

7.plot: After six weeks and no sight of the Green Goblin, Spider-Man finally catches him robbing a bank. Can Spider-Man stop the Green Goblin from stealing a giant dollar bill?

8.title: Hunt for the Spider!

episode of.title: Spider-Man: The Cheesy Stop-Motion Adventures (TV Series 2012– )

8.plot: Kraven the Hunter is on a mission to hunt down the ultimate prey: Spider-Man! Can the wall-crawler escape the most skilled hunter in the world?

9.title: The Terrorifying Return of the Green Goblin!

episode of.title: Spider-Man: The Cheesy Stop-Motion Adventures (TV Series 2012– )

9.plot: Norman Osborn now knows the true identity of Spider-Man: Peter Parker. Now, whenever Peter changes into Spider-Man, the Green Goblin will be ready! Can Spidey escape the Green Goblin's weapons?

10.title: Sands of Death! Part One

episode of.title: Spider-Man: The Cheesy Stop-Motion Adventures (TV Series 2012– )

10.plot: Sandman escapes the police and goes back to doing his old tricks. Can Spider-Man stop the man made out of sand again... or will it be up to someone else?

11.title: Sands of Death! Part Two

episode of.title: Spider-Man: The Cheesy Stop-Motion Adventures (TV Series 2012– )

11.plot: Sandman escapes the police and goes back to his old tricks. Can Spider-Man stop the man made out of sand again - or will it be up to someone else?

12.title: Spidey Battles Scorpey!

episode of.title: Spider-Man: The Cheesy Stop-Motion Adventures (TV Series 2012– )

12.plot: The amazing Spider-Man has now become the "headless" prey of his latest foe: the Scorpion! Can the wall-crawler protect himself and the city from this deadly villain?

13.title: The Heart-Stopping Revenge of the Green Goblin!

episode of.title: Spider-Man: The Cheesy Stop-Motion Adventures (TV Series 2012– )

13.plot: In this special Halloween episode, Norman Osborn can now control his glider without riding it and he's now gonna use it to destroy Peter Parker! Can Spider-Man defeat a flying piece of metal that drops bombs and shoots lightning?

14.title: The Awesome Power of the Green Goblin! Part One

episode of.title: Spider-Man: The Cheesy Stop-Motion Adventures (TV Series 2012– )

14.plot: Spider-Man may know the true identity of the Green Goblin - Norman Osborn. Can Spidey prove this theory or will that mission be the death of him?

15.title: The Awesome Power of the Green Goblin! Part Two

episode of.title: Spider-Man: The Cheesy Stop-Motion Adventures (TV Series 2012– )

15.plot: Spider-Man may know the true identity of the Green Goblin - Norman Osborn. Can Spidey prove this theory or will that mission be the death of him?

16.title: Spidey Against Scorpey!

episode of.title: Spider-Man: The Cheesy Stop-Motion Adventures (TV Series 2012– )

16.plot: While trying to discover more informations about the Green Goblin, Spider-Man is attacked by the Scorpion yet again! Can Spidey defeat Scorpey or will Scorpey defeat Spidey?

17.title: Doc Ock Rocks!

episode of.title: Spider-Man: The Cheesy Stop-Motion Adventures (TV Series 2012– )

17.plot: The Doc is up to his old disappearing tricks again! Can Spider-Man defeat him or is Doc Ock far too evil this time around for the web-swinger?

18.title: Hunt for the Spider... Again!

episode of.title: Spider-Man: The Cheesy Stop-Motion Adventures (TV Series 2012– )

18.plot: The ultimate hunter is hunting the ultimate prey - again. Who will end up being the prey this time - Spider-Man or Kraven The Hunter?

19.title: I Am the Rhino!

episode of.title: Spider-Man: The Cheesy Stop-Motion Adventures (TV Series 2012– )

19.plot: While doing his duties, Spider-Man is attacked by his strangest villain yet: the Rhino! Will Spidey be able to defeat a foe bigger then him or will he get his butt kicked Kraven-style?

20.title: The Sinister Six!

episode of.title: Spider-Man: The Cheesy Stop-Motion Adventures (TV Series 2012– )

20.plot: Spider-Man battles more then one villain, in fact, he battles six. Can Spidey defend himself organist Sandman, Doc Ock, Kraven the Hunter, the Lizard, the Scorpion and the Rhino?

21.title: The Last Stand of the Green Goblin!

episode of.title: Spider-Man: The Cheesy Stop-Motion Adventures (TV Series 2012– )

21.plot: Spider-Man must do what he has failed to do before: defeat the Green Goblin. How will the wall-crawler do it - if at all?

22.title: The Beginning Ends!

episode of.title: Spider-Man: The Cheesy Stop-Motion Adventures (TV Series 2012– )

22.plot:

imdb.title: Spider-Man: The Cheesy Stop-Motion Adventures
plot: A series of two-minute stop-motion epics involving your favorite (and the only) web-swinging, wall-crawling superhero: Spider-Man!::MultiMarvelMike, co-creator
